query: ALTER TABLE `#__social_audios` ADD COLUMN `scheduled` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 AFTER `isnew`
ALTER TABLE `#__social_videos` ADD COLUMN `scheduled` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 AFTER `isnew`
ALTER TABLE `#__social_stream_tags` ADD COLUMN `state` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1 AFTER `title`
ALTER TABLE `#__social_polls` ADD COLUMN `state` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1 AFTER `expiry_date`
ALTER TABLE `#__social_mailer` ADD COLUMN `sid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 AFTER `id`
ALTER TABLE `#__social_notifications` ADD COLUMN `sid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 AFTER `uid`
ALTER TABLE `#__social_broadcasts` ADD COLUMN `stream_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 AFTER `id`
